bwwExcerpt: A revival of Stephen Sondheim's 'Follies' has arrived on Broadway just in time for Halloween. It's perfect for the season â€” it's got ghosts, skeletons bursting out of closets and a haunted house. It's also a treat. 'Come on, let's go home,' Phyllis says at the end of the show to Ben. But it's been such a good and tuneful production that you may hope no one listens to her and the ghosts stick around just a little longer.
